Title: Relates to establishing Bella's Law, which correlates animal abuse with domestic violence
Summary: Establishes Bella's Law which calls for an investigation into possible domestic violence or abuse for persons who have been accused of animal abuse.
LawCode: Add ยง353-aa, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to enacting "Bella's Law"
